description:
Sakura tries to sneak out of the village to find Sasuke, but Naruto intercepts her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enfin une mission de rang S !
Infiltration investigation?! A Super S-Class Mission Has Finally Arrived!
Sennyuu Sousa!? Tsui ni Kitakita Chyou S-Kyuu Ninmu
บุกไปสืบเลย ภารกิจระดับเอส
